data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in for Newcastle at St James' Park.
In the minute 1, Free kick for Newcastle in the half of Everton.
Free kick for Newcastle in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Everton in Newcastle upon Tyne.
In the minute 4, Newcastle needs to be cautious. Everton have an attacking throw-in.
Stuart Attwell signals a Everton throw-in in Newcastle's half.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
In the minute 6, Callum Wilson of Newcastle gets in a strike, but is off target.
Stuart Attwell awards Everton a goal kick.
Throw-in for Newcastle in the half of Everton.
In the minute 8, Stuart Attwell awards the away team a throw-in.
Everton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Everton close to the penalty box.
In the minute 12, Can Everton capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Newcastle's half?
Stuart Attwell signals a throw-in for Everton, close to Newcastle's area.
Throw-in for Newcastle in their own half.
In the minute 13, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Newcastle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Everton.
In the minute 15, Can Newcastle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Everton's half?
Newcastle to take a throw-in in Everton territory.
Ball safe as Newcastle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 17, Throw-in Newcastle.
Newcastle to take a throw-in in Everton territory.
In Newcastle upon Tyne a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 18, Free kick Everton.
Throw-in for Newcastle in the half of Everton.
Stuart Attwell awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 23, Can Everton get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Newcastle's half?
Ball safe as Newcastle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Goal kick for Newcastle at St James' Park.
In the minute 25, Everton awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Newcastle at St James' Park.
Ball goes out of play for a Newcastle goal kick.
In the minute 29, Throw-in Newcastle.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
Everton have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
In Newcastle upon Tyne Newcastle drive forward through Allan Saint-Maximin. His shot is on target but it's saved.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Newcastle close to the penalty box.
In the minute 32, At St James' Park, Niels Nkounkou has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 33, Newcastle's Jeff Hendrick gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Everton defender.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Corner awarded to Newcastle.
In the minute 38, Corner awarded to Everton.
Everton's Abdoulaye Doucoure is on target but unsuccessful.
Stuart Attwell signals a Newcastle throw-in in Everton's half.
In the minute 39, Newcastle have a dangerous throw-in.
Attention is being given to Evertonâ€™s Allan and play has been suspended briefly.
Everton's Allan is back in action after a slight knock.
In the minute 40, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Newcastle have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
Everton to take a throw-in in Newcastle territory.
In the minute 43, In Newcastle upon Tyne, Dominic Calvert-Lewin of Everton is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Everton are pushing forward but Fabian Delph's finish is wide of the goal.
Newcastle have a goal kick.
In the minute 44, Important block from the Newcastle defence as Dominic Calvert-Lewin fires in a strike for Everton.
Throw-in for Newcastle in their own half.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Newcastle upon Tyne.
In the minute 45, Everton have a dangerous throw-in.
Stuart Attwell blows to end the first-half.
The second-half is underway at St James' Park.
In the minute 46, Newcastle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Gylfi Sigurdsson (Everton) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Newcastle upon Tyne to check on Dominic Calvert-Lewin, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 50, Everton's Dominic Calvert-Lewin looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Throw-in for Everton at St James' Park.
Free kick for Everton in their own half.
In the minute 53, Throw-in high up the field for Newcastle in Newcastle upon Tyne.
Newcastle have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
Newcastle have been awarded a penalty in Newcastle upon Tyne...
In the minute 55, Callum Wilson (Newcastle) gets a yellow card.
Goal! Callum Wilson gives Newcastle a 1-0 lead from the penalty spot.
Sean Longstaff gets his shot on target but fails to score for Newcastle.
In the minute 59, Corner awarded to Newcastle.
Everton are coming forward and Gylfi Sigurdsson gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Newcastle upon Tyne.
In the minute 60, The away team replace Andre Gomes with Bernard.
Throw-in Newcastle.
Stuart Attwell awards Newcastle a goal kick.
In the minute 63, Stuart Attwell signals a Everton throw-in in Newcastle's half.
Free kick for Everton in the half of Newcastle.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Everton.
In the minute 64, Gylfi Sigurdsson (Everton) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Everton's Niels Nkounkou misses with an attempt on goal.
Newcastle have a goal kick.
In the minute 68, Throw-in for Everton in the half of Newcastle.
Free kick Newcastle.
Cenk Tosun is on a sub for Niels Nkounkou for Everton.
In the minute 69, Yerry Mina (Everton) has received a first yellow card.
Everton awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Newcastle upon Tyne Newcastle attack through Jacob Murphy. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 71, Goal kick for Everton at St James' Park.
In Newcastle upon Tyne a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Everton's Allan has been booked in Newcastle upon Tyne.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Newcastle.
Newcastle's Jacob Murphy misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 74, Ball goes out of play for a Everton goal kick.
Ryan Fraser is replacing Allan Saint-Maximin for the home team.
Everton push forward at St James' Park and Abdoulaye Doucoure gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Newcastle defence.
Can Everton capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Newcastle's half?
Free kick Everton.
In the minute 77, The away team have replaced Jonjoe Kenny with Alex Iwobi. This is the third substitution made today by Carlo Ancelotti.
Michael Keane (Everton) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 78, It's a goal kick for the home team in Newcastle upon Tyne.
Can Newcastle get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Everton's half?
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Newcastle just outside Everton's area.
In the minute 81, Jeff Hendrick for the home team is judged to be offside.
Stuart Attwell signals a throw-in for Everton, close to Newcastle's area.
Throw-in for Everton close to the penalty box.
In the minute 83, Newcastle make their second substitution with Isaac Hayden replacing Miguel Almiron.
Everton pushes forward through Gylfi Sigurdsson, whose finish on goal is saved.
Great finish from Callum Wilson to give Newcastle a 2-0 lead.
In the minute 87, Everton's Dominic Calvert-Lewin gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Newcastle have a goal kick.
Steve Bruce is making the team's third substitution at St James' Park with Andy Carroll replacing Callum Wilson.
In the minute 88, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Stuart Attwell signals a free kick to Newcastle in their own half.
Abdoulaye Doucoure (Everton) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Everton's Gylfi Sigurdsson breaks free at St James' Park. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Ball goes out of play for a Newcastle goal kick.
6 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Ball safe as Everton is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Important block from the Newcastle defence as Gylfi Sigurdsson fires in a strike for Everton.
Everton have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
Stuart Attwell awards the home team a throw-in.
In Newcastle upon Tyne a free kick has been awarded the away team.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Newcastle upon Tyne.
Bernard of Everton smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Everton have been awarded a corner by Stuart Attwell.
Stuart Attwell blows to end the match. The final score is 2-1.
Dominic Calvert-Lewin keeps the away team in the match by reducing the deficit to 2-1.
That's a fine assist from Alex Iwobi.
Jacob Murphy for Newcastle has been booked by Stuart Attwell and receives a first yellow card.
